summary: Result-oriented business analyst with strong co-ordinational skills and an extensive background in Financial booking processes, Master Data and Stakeholder management with a broad view on both the Business and IT aspects. A logical thinker with strong analytical skills, decision making and problem-solving abilities. With 7 years’ experience of successfully improving processes and performance through collecting, reviewing and analysing information. With an eye for detail and ability to perform under pressure of short deadlines. With the capability of visualizing and implementing solutions for complex master data processes.

profile_positions.description: Experienced Product Owner and Business Analyst with an strong background in master data management as a key connector between Business and IT. A logical thinker with strong analytical, communication and intercultural skills, decision making and problem-solving abilities. Extensive experience in Master Data Management, Project Coordination, Stakeholder Management, Offshore Team Management, Process design and improvement.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant - Scrum Product Owner

profile_positions.description:
▪Authority on customer master data and processes within the data services organization. 
▪Managing teams on and offshore, to ensure high service levels, data quality and costs for respective service area
▪SPOC to supported markets, and Landing zone for customer master data projects that impact operations processes
▪Coordination of Data Quality initiatives 
▪Coordinate with data migration team, to prepare and cleanse data, to ensure a smooth and timely migration 
▪Drive process improvements, implementing data governance and processes. Active role in establishing the Philips Integrated Landscape, E2E solutions and embed new processes in Operations
▪Partner with the Product Owner, IT support and Program of MDM Informatica to ensure system related operational process improvements are captured in user stories for the next possible release, provide input on improvements and troubleshoot operational system related issues
▪Actively participate in master data related Value Stream Mapping sessions on improvement in master data processes 
▪Design set up of business requirements and actively participate in user integration testing
▪Ensure and monitor compliance (ICS, SOX)
▪Ensure trained staff at Philips and our service partner
profile_positions.title: Subject Matter Expert

profile_positions.description:
▪	Master Data creation, maintenance and issue solving for customer, vendor, labour hours, hierarchy and materials
▪	Extraction and preparation of data for migration
▪	Data quality improvement efforts
▪Process improvement
▪User Acceptance Testing of systems to be implemented
▪System roll out/deployment activities representing the customer master data process
▪Create and maintain business documents; Service Level Agreement, Service Level Description, Service Catalogue, Work Instructions and operational process flows
▪Training and Transitioning of customer master data activities to third party providers
▪1st & 2nd line Support to third party providers
▪Market support
▪Link between business and IT support teams in regards to master data
profile_positions.title: Master Data Specialist

profile_positions.description:
▪Integration testing of SAP system for Rebates E2E process, during implementation
▪Lead end user readiness activities and trainings; pre and post go live
▪Provide the first line of end user support
▪Resolve service desk tickets
▪Promote SAP system use and on-going process improvement
▪Stakeholder role mapping
profile_positions.title: Customer Programs SAP Business Process Champion

profile_positions.description:
▪Management of the Customer Program (rebates, marketing, shared Advertising etc.) across EMEA
▪Resolve disputes in collaboration with Local Finance, Sales, AR and AP
▪SPOC for all customer program related issues and procedures
▪Process improvement
▪Settlement of rebate agreements throughout the year and reconciliation of customer AR and AP accrual ledgers
▪Sarbanes Oxley compliance on invoice approvals and payments
▪Team collaboration between Customer, AR, AP, Disbursements, Data Integrity, Sales and Finance
▪Issue escalation appropriately
profile_positions.title: Customer Program Associate (Rebates)

profile_positions.description:
▪Processing invoices, including; Cost coding, Matching against purchase orders
▪Resolve supplier invoicing and payment issues
▪Master data set up to facilitate automation of payments
▪Analysis and documentation of local business processes to as part of migrating these processes to shared services
▪Provide a high level of support, good working relationships and service to local business units and departments
▪Ensure all supplier invoices are paid timely according to company defined payment terms
profile_positions.title: Accounts Payable Associate
